reviewText: I just want to say this is the cutest, family movie you could ever buy, especially if you love puppies!! What a fun story line. (And no, this is not sad at all!!) I RECOMMEND IT TO ALL!! GREAT JOB TO THE DAMIANS FOR WRITING AND DIRECTING SUCH A GREAT MOVIE FOR THE YOUNG AND OLD :)
Stupid!  Not one bit like the original movie and shouldn't be associated with it at all.  What a waste of money renting this foolishness.
Great family movie.
DVD was blank
Great movie, great price

I purchased this movie and previously purchased a Vizio television with an AMAZON VIDEO App that includes an "Amazon" BUTTON on the remote control - PURCHASED not rented - in reliance on the availability of this AND MANY OTHER MOVIES for viewing by my PERMANENTLY DEVELOPMENTALLY DISABLED 26 YEAR OLD daughter on the AMAZON Video App on the remote because she is not, as a consequence of her disability, able to maneuver screens and log-ins on a television.  In fact, I have purchased over 140 (ONE HUNDRED FORTY) movies on Amazon Video in reliance on her ability to view them on her television, which she is not able to do on other televisions we own, such as Sony televisions, having complex menu systems.  Now, TODAY, JUNE 15, 2016, Amazon has decided to discontinue support of Amazon Video on her Vizio television and instead wants me to buy a Firestick for $50, which she will undoubtedly be unable to use!  This is fraud.  This is likely also a violation of the Americans with Disabilities Act, and just bad business!!!!!! Do not BUY ANY AMAZON VIDEOS unless you intend to purchase a new television every year to keep up with Amazon's unscrupulous and fraudulent business practices.
My daughter can't stop watching this movie?
Did not like it. It has nothing to do with the original Marley and Me and not even the same characters
My 6 year old twins LOVE this movie! They saw it on Sprout one night and have asked to watch it again. It has adorable animals and cute comedy.
Not a fan. Wasn't expecting too much and it still didn't meet expectations.
Cute, definitely a kids movie.
This is a movie for kids. Good story and very entertaining for kids.
Great movie for kiddos!  Was worried after watching "Marley and Me"...but my 5 year old LOVES it
Terrible. Nothing at all like the original Marley movie.

I have two girls under 9. They love the "Buddy" movies, and wanted to watch "Marley and Me", but it would have left them heartbroken. This is the perfect blend; the antics of Marley without the sadness of the loss of a beloved pet. Kept my girls entertained through several viewings!
Great puppy movie for the family
Cute story -- suitable for small children to watch with the family.
Its what my son wanted for christmas.
Watched it with my elementary aged grandson.  A fun story with age appropriate action.
This is a poorly done movie that has nothing to do with the story line from Marley & Me.
I'm a sucker for puppies...great movie!!!
Great Movie! I think i have a Marley descendant :)

Can't tell you much about this movie except it's a classic. I purchased it for my wife as she's fond of this type of entertainment. She enjoyed it a great deal. I recommend it to anyone enjoying this genre of movie.
Just as described
kids love it
Again , all movies that have dogs and animals we love .
great
The movie is good.
Me and my friends could of made a better movie with our 2004 flip phone video cameras. So so bad
Fun for the whole family.
great fun movie for family to watch together
My 3 year old loves this movie!
Received an excellent condition, worked great
Kids love this movie
AGAIN, I AM WAITING FOR MY GRANDCHILD TO COME VISIT BEFORE I WATCH IT, SO I DON'T HATE IT, JUST HAVEN'T HAD HER HERE TO WATCH IT WITH ME.
Kiddie flick

"The Puppy Years" is too foolish.  Not only would an adult be turned off by the formula-driven aspect and over-acting, but I wouldn't expect a five-year-old child to be happy with it either.  Was this film truly terrible?  It is as close to a single-star as one can get.

On the other hand, I do recommend the original "Marley & Me" film.  That film was tender, sweet, and also executed by professionals (on-screen and off).
This has become one of my 3 year old granddaughters favorite movies. So cute.
I really enjoyed this movie a lot, it was precious and hilarious. I Would definitely watch this movie over and over again.
What can I say?  YUCK!  Not nearly as cute and funny as the first Marley & Me.  Save your money, don't even bother renting it!  I usually LOVE dog movies, but this was not at all what I expected.
The movie has a nice storyline. It is a bit boring at times for kids over the age of 12.

I liked the first movie much better.  It was much more interesting and emotionally engaging becuse you could see it was based on a real family with real feamily problems and dynamics.  Even if the movie would have been based on a FAKE, MAKE BELIEVE FAMILY, the writing for the first movie was much better.

I loved Marley & Me.  You can't even compare the two.  Bad plot and acting.  Very disappointing.  Would not recommend anybody wasting time or money on this, especially if you are expecting the same caliper as Marley & Me.
This movie is not for people over the age of 4. Please do not waist your money. Yawn yawn yawn
My son LOVES this movie, but it is a beating to watch, so just know that going in...it definitely is not a prequel to the movie Marley and Me..
I don't get this but my children (who are petrified of dogs) just love this movie.  It is very wholesome while still keeping their interest.
I bought this movie for the kids I babysit for and it keeps them entertained during the week.  They love it so I love it
the dog talks in this film so if you want to see the book come to life, I would pass on this movie and find the movie without "the puppy years". Other wise it is a cute movie.
While it's nothing like the original, kids will enjoy it.  Not to hard for an adult to sit through which is how I rate kids movies since we are the one's that watch with them.
It exceded my expectations, happy with everything. I would recommend this way of doing business to anyone. Thanks for great service.
This movie has got to be the most aggravating, terrible movie I have ever seen. The plot is sudden, and predictable. This movie will not bring any joy to a family, or to anyone at all.

My son (8 yrs) loves this movie. It is cute and funny. I really like it, too. It is very well made for this type of film and the story is interesting. The large variety of dogs in it will satisfy lovers of many breeds. Min pins, aussies, and labs figure prominently as does a cat. The lead actor is Lucas Cruikshank from the Fred series that many kids love.
Showed it to my little after school class (age 4-9), it was awful. I fell asleep and they kept asking when it would be over. Terrible movie. Stick with Disney.
I was able to watch this with my grandchildren and not worry about language.  It was a very positive movie.  Puppies voices were cute.  Good wins over evil.

This was a good childs movie.  I have become used to the price of videos delivered to me from Amazon being the least expensive possible.  So I didn't do any comparative shopping. By this method the movie was way over priced.  I went to Walmart the next day and found a copy of this in a duel pack with the Marley and Me, and purchased both movies for $9.99.  This was my first purchase from Amazon Cloud.  If that is the value I am going to get, I'm not sure if there is another one in the near future. If I would have done my homework I would have realized the price of $21.99 at least twice what it should have been.  If I do buy any more movies from the amazon, I will do more price shopping first.
My girls love any type of movie with a cute puppy in it! This is a great family movie! Love it!
Enjoyed watching it with my kids! I expected a movie similar to the first one (minus the death) but it is for a much younger group.
The item was shipped and received on time with no damage.  This dvd is a christmas present for my daughter.
This is a nice PG family film. Anything with dogs that is done well is good entertainment.  Nice to watch with our Grandchildren.

Marley & Me was great----a real heart-tugger for dog lovers.  A testimony of faithfulness and commitment to the canine critter you brought into your family.  "The Puppy Years" was fun and light w/o tugging at your heart.
Another one of my 2 year old granddaughters favorites and she watches it all the time...we were very pleased with the quality of the movie for the price we paid for it!
The wrong disk was in the right cover. I sent it to my grand daughter so I couldn't send it back.

This is definitely a kid-oriented movie and on that level, it succeeds as a cute enjoyable film.  Adults might find it too contrived and difficult to appreciate.
THE PUPPY YEARS is obviously an attempt to cash in on its successful origins but is so amateurishly done, there is no real comparison.  First problem is the decision to have the animals talk.  It's become a tired device and the voice characterizations aren't particularly effective.  The human actors tend to overact and poor Donnelly Rhodes (DaVinci's Inquest) is forced to act as second banana to the dogs.
But I'm being too Scroogish...family films are intended to entertain families looking for wholesome entertainment.  This movie should meet that criteria just fine.

I will buy more products from Amazon.  It is very prompt and there are no problems with the products that I have ordered such as Marley & Me 2 The Puppy Years DVD.  I was pleased to have this DVD mailed promptly and came in the condition that was written with the price and product on Amazon.  Thanks for the prompt delivery.  My son really enjoyed the DVD for Christmas.
My granddaughter begged me for this movie so I got it for her. She says it was so cute & she loves it. Although I haven't seen it yet, if she's happy I'm happy.

Marley & Me was great, although sad and probably inappropriate for some children.  But this is just a sad and poor excuse to gain dollars from those who loved the original book and/or film or those families who like the "buddy" films.  Why make the dog talk?  And what age was the "lead" Bodi supposed to be?  The script, the premise and everything about this film was clearly rushed so that "they" could make profit on it.  Rent a Buddy movie or something else but SKIP this!!!!!  And whatever you do...don't BUY it!!1!

I was duped into renting this movie. I thought it would be somewhat similar to the original Marley & Me, but it wasn't. This movie is very similar to the Air Buddies series. If you like those movies you might like this one. Otherwise you should just watch the old one again (or read the book.)
It came on time and worked great
Excellent experience, if you ever had dog make you smile and feel so sad...
My granddaughters really liked this movie they are 9, 10 and 11.
Lame movie. Not the same actors, not based on the book... just a lame spin off.
Loved this movie, it was cute
Amazon rules to find great movies for less
This is so cute! Marley talks!  And my yellow lab looks just like him!  He loves watching his Marley movie.  It's perfectly magical and should be owned by everyone!
Brutal, but the little ones like it. Did I mention that it's brutal
Loved it
